articles.title: WHO estimates globally more than 10 Cr people get infected with Hepatitis A every year: Everything you should know about Hepatitis A disease, prevention and vaccination - Times of India
articles.description: Spotlight News: Everything you should know about Hepatitis A disease, prevention and vaccination.
articles.content:
Hepatitis A is a contagious liver infection which is caused by the Hepatitis A virus
1. Its severity can range from a mild to severe illness which can last from few weeks to months. The World Health… [+4555 chars]
